p: All the test preparations, i.e., ethyl acetate extract, flavonoids and cardiac glycosides were found to be non-cytotoxic and non-mutagenic in nature, as assessed by Ames test and MTT assay, respectively (Table T2 in Additional file 5). In Ames test, no revertant colonies were seen upon exposure to the test preparations as compared to the numerous revertant colonies (856) obtained upon exposure to the known mutagen , i.e. , sodium azide. In MTT assay, the test preparations were found to be non-cytotoxic as evident from the high viability of the blood cells post-exposure [96.02% (ethyl acetate extract); 91.83% (flavonoids); 96.56% (cardiac glycosides)].
